title: May: First Moves
description: Establish your campaign’s foundation by choosing an early strategic path and making your first major Candidate Coin investments.
readingSummary: Congratulations — you’ve completed your filing requirements. You are now officially a candidate in the eyes of both the State of Texas and the Federal Election Commission.
In the first month after filing, real candidates make their earliest investments. This is when voters, donors, and the media decide if you’re serious.
You must choose one strategic path for your campaign:
1. Fundraising Strategy → Build a plan to raise money.
2. Volunteer Base → Recruit and organize people to support you.
3. Media & Advertising → Announce yourself through press, social media, or ads.
At this stage, every candidate must also make basic campaign purchases to prove legitimacy — like a website, email system, and campaign tools.
That’s where the Candidate Coin Store comes in.

tasks.prompt: Here are your available campaign resources. Spend Candidate Coins (CC) wisely to establish your infrastructure.

Candidate Coin Store:
- Website / Domain / Email → 7 CC
- Explorer Pack (1 month tools) → 5 CC
- Navigator Pack (2 months tools) → 8 CC
- Settler Pack (3 months tools) → 12 CC
- Colonist Pack (4 months tools) → 18 CC
- Revolutionist Pack (5 months tools) → 24 CC
- Founder Pack (6 months tools) → 30 CC
- Digital Ads (per month) → 2–12 CC

Choose ONE strategic path and write your implementation plan:
- 📈 Fundraising Strategy
- 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Volunteer Base
- 📺 Media & Advertising

If Fundraising Strategy: include your fundraising goal, methods, and success measures.
If Volunteer Base: describe where volunteers come from, how you’ll engage them, and their campaign roles.
If Media & Advertising: specify your chosen platforms, ad spending, and why your plan is cost-effective.

purpose: Teach users how to make early campaign investments, select a strategic direction, and manage Candidate Coin spending.

scenarios.title: Fundraising Strategy
scenarios.description: Write a plan describing how you’ll raise funds, the methods used (events, calls, online), and your measurement of success.

scenarios.title: Volunteer Base
scenarios.description: Explain how you’ll recruit, organize, and retain volunteers while defining their campaign roles.

scenarios.title: Media & Advertising
scenarios.description: Describe your promotional strategy across media platforms, spending choices, and rationale for cost-effectiveness.

outcome.description: The user selects and completes a strategic plan, spending Candidate Coins on campaign tools and receiving bonus signatures for detailed, well-structured submissions.

nextModule.title: Campaign Identity
nextModule.description: Define your slogan, mission, and issue priorities while expanding campaign presence.
